titles.title: His Name Is Higher Than Any Other

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His name is higher than any other, His name is Jesus, His name is Lord. His name is higher than any other, His name is Jesus, His name is Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His name is Wonderful, His name is Counselor. His name is Prince of Peace, the Mighty God. His name is higher than any other. His name is Jesus, His name is Lord.{/lang-eng}
